turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order four medium gluten-free crust pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what do you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make two of them cheese and green pepper? And then two of them chicken and broccoli?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately, it doesn't look like bella luna has broccoli on their menu.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to substitute for something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please make them chicken and green pepper.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You said you wanted 4 medium pizzas with gluten free crust, 2 with cheese and green peppers, and 2 with chicken and green peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $45.55 is the total. would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order for review. it'll be processed, baked, and ready for pick up in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can do for you?
